name: Cure Wounds
description: A creature you touch regains hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

name: Fireball
components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
description: A bright streak erupts into a 20-foot radius sphere of flame dealing 8d6 fire damage.

name: Mage Armor
components: V, S, M (a piece of cured leather)
description: You ward a willing creature, granting an AC of 13 + Dexterity modifier while it isn't wearing armor.

name: Magic Missile
description: You create three glowing darts of force that automatically hit and deal 1d4 + 1 force damage each.

name: Shield
description: An invisible barrier of force appears, granting +5 AC until the start of your next turn.
